summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingAchieve a soft matte, sun-kissed look with Benefit's waterproof Hoola Matte Powder Bronzer that is buildable, blendable, and lasts up to 12 hours.
details: DetailsFeaturesAward-winning bronzer that makes you look sun-kissed even in sweater weatherUltra-fine, silky-soft powder builds & blends to create a natural-looking matte bronze that lasts all dayItem 2595640How To UseSwirl brush in bronzer. Apply all over to warm your complexion or place on cheeks, forehead, nose, jawline. Build and blend.IngredientsSynthetic Fluorphlogopite, Mica, Calcium Carbonate, Lauroyl Lysine, Zinc Stearate, Boron Nitride, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Silica, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil. [+/- CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 15850 (Red 7), CI 77007 (Ultramarines), CI 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), CI 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), CI 77742 (Manganese Violet)].Disclaimer: Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a benefit product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Swirl brush in bronzer. Apply all over to warm your complexion or place on cheeks, forehead, nose, jawline. Build and blend.
ingredients: please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use

reviews.headline: Worth it
reviews.comments: This is so nice to put over my cream bronzer, such a pretty shade ! Love !

reviews.headline: hoola bronzer
reviews.comments: it's good, very buttery and easy to blend.

reviews.headline: Bronzer
reviews.comments: Perfect shade

reviews.headline: The brush is no longer included
reviews.comments: Over the year, I have bought way too many of these to count. I have them in different purses, my gym bag, at school, in my car etc. But as the pallets get empty, I'm not buying any more because they no longer have a brush included which made them so great for on-the-go. There are other larger bronzers that I prefer to use daily instead if I have to pack a brush and mirror anyway. Why can't they make the packaging big enough to put the brush in there and sell it seperatly?!? So dumb.

reviews.headline: so slayyy
reviews.comments: im pretty pale so i dont need much but it doesnt make me look orange which is a win for meðŸ˜­

reviews.headline: AMAZINGG
reviews.comments: i used this for my nose contour and it was OUTSANDING!!! I LOVED THIS CONTOUR SM!!

reviews.headline: Better than contouring
reviews.comments: I love how well this lasts and how easy it is to use. You can use like you would contour or lightly give yourself a bronze glow without being shiny

reviews.headline: Love I have been using for years
reviews.comments: No other product works as well

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments: Would repurchase as soon as I run out. Amazing blending with any foundation. Perfect for my skintone

reviews.headline: I like it, but don't love it
reviews.comments: I really do like this bronzer, however the mini is such a loss for your buck. If you are going to use this a lot definitely get the bigger size. I like the color output and I definitely don't get an "orange" bronze from it. I'm not really sure what it is about it that makes me not love it but it will definitely give you that bronzey look.

reviews.headline: great product, pricey though
reviews.comments: it is great, but theres many dupes for much cheaper

reviews.headline: YES! YES!
reviews.comments: I love it!

reviews.headline: Easiest bronzer to use
reviews.comments: For whatever reason I struggle with bronzers. I wind up looking too orange or too shimmery or something. This is the only bronzer I've been able to successfully use because its so smooth and blendable and natural looking.

reviews.headline: Great Bronzer
reviews.comments: The best bronzer I have used!

reviews.headline: Best bronzer ever
reviews.comments: This is the perfect shade - not too orange, not too brown, not too shiny, not too flat, no sparkles, etc.  I've wasted so much money trying to find the right bronzer over the years.  Just buy this one.

reviews.headline: I buy this product again and again!
reviews.comments: I love this and use it daily!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: The color looks good on my skin type

reviews.headline: Breakout
reviews.comments: I loved this bronzer until I realized that its the reason my face has been breaking out so bad :( Although it is a great product, if ur acne prone I would not recommend.

reviews.headline: Smooth product and goes on lightly
reviews.comments: Lasts a long time, goes on smoothly and lightly so you can blend in more, needs to be reapplied after a while

reviews.headline: I love this
reviews.comments: the coverage is actually amazing the color is great you should defjelty get it trust me

media.headline: In love with this bronzer
media.caption: That's me with my new fav bronzer on

faceoff_positive.comments: Have been using for years now--possibly 6-7..? I am very fair-skinned in the winter, but can get very tan if I try. I've found this product works for both sides of me. Just a light sweep does the trip to make me look sunkissed and "alive" in the winter and never looks fake. In the summer, it's the perfect compliment to my tan. Recently, however, I LOVE using it as an eyeshadow. Whether alone, with eyeliner, or with another color shadow over--this bronzer sets my lids to the perfect natural bronzed shade, or works well to prep and put something else over. LOVE!
faceoff_positive.headline: Have been using for years now--possibly 6-7..? I am very...

faceoff_negative.comments: I used to LOVE this bronzer. There was no changing my mind on it. It was the perfect formula and perfect shade. After about 8 months, I started to notice it was too orange for my liking. On my light, olive/yellow asian skin tone, it just pulled too warm and yellow undertoned on me. I look back at old pictures and notice it as well. Now it's been over 2 years and I don't love it anymore and I'd never repurchase it again. It's a really nice formula but the shade just does not work on me
faceoff_negative.headline: Used to love it, now it's eh
